Plugin.name: Deploy
Homepage.title: Fully-managed Cloud Hosting for your Balerion Project
Homepage.subTitle: Follow this 2 steps process to get Everything You Need to Run Balerion in Production.
Homepage.githubBox.subTitle.versioned: You did it! You're just one step ahead of having your project hosted online.
Homepage.githubBox.subTitle.not-versione: Your project has to be versioned on GitHub before deploying on Balerion Cloud.
Homepage.cloudBox.title: Deploy to Balerion Cloud
Homepage.cloudBox.subTitle: Enjoy a Balerion-optimized stack including database, email provider, and CDN.
Homepage.textBox.label.not-versioned: Why uploading my project to GitHub?
Homepage.textBox.text.versioned: Balerion Cloud offers a 14 days free trial for you to experiment with your project on the cloud including all features.
Homepage.textBox.text.not-versioned: Balerion Cloud will fetch and deploy your project from your GitHub repository. This is the best way to version, manage and deploy your project. Follow the steps on GitHub to successfully upload it.
